attributes.action: Demand a Public Apology for the Neglect of Rubel Ahmed
attributes.additional_details:
We, the Undersigned, demand a public declaration of apology from the Home Secretary, Theresa May, for her Department's pivotal role in the unnecessary death of Rubel Ahmed at the Morton Hall Immigration Centre.

The Home Office's actions deprived Rubel Ahmed of his right to life which is illegal under the European Convention on Human Rights.
